main event: A U.S. Air Force Technical Information Sheet containing a questionnaire for recording summary data related to a UFO sighting on 6 Nov 54.
interesting points: The object was observed to be old high in the sky, with a luminous tone similar to that of a moon. It appeared to be stationary and reflecting light.
The witness observed the object for 5-7 minutes and reported that there was no sound at all.
The document includes sketches and instructions for the witness to indicate the object's position in the sky and its motion.
Questions about the weather conditions, the movement of the witness, and the appearance of the object compared to the background of the sky were included in the questionnaire.
Various details such as sound, color, size, and appearance of the object were requested from the witness to provide a clear picture of the observation.
